nodes.text: 1138 was a CR90 corvette, serving in the Imperial Navy as part of Task Force Vengeance.
During the Galactic Civil War, 1138 was destroyed by the MC80 Star Cruiser Liberty as a diversion by the Rebel Alliance during the Skirmish near Almaran.
1138 is a recurring number in Star Wars. It is a reference to the early George Lucas film THX-1138.
